mapper.select: SELECT cbpl.* FROM CBPL cbpl INNER JOIN CBPK cbpk on cbpk.CBPK01= cbpl.CBPK01 INNER JOIN CBOA cboa ON cboa.CBOA07=cbpk.sale_order_no WHERE cbpk.check_status=1 AND cbpl.CBPL08=#{goodsId} AND cbpk.sale_order_no=#{orderNo}
